title: Deep Secret
description: Rupert Venables is the junior Magid of Earth. All over the Multiverse the Magids, powerful magicians, are at work to maintain the balance between positive and negative magic for the good of all. They use their powers to push people into doing the right thing at the right time. But Rupert's senior has died and Rupert, aided by the ghost of the deceased, must search the Earth for a new junior, while preventing civilization from descending into chaos. it seems like a good idea to cause all five candidates to attend one SF convention in England. But then all magic breaks loose.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
